Fatty Bear's Birthday Surprise ('Fatty Bear' no Bikkuri Tanjoubi!) is the second
video game made by Humongous Entertainment (the first being Putt-Putt Joins the
Parade) and the first and only of the Fatty Bear video games, not counting
spinoffs. It was released in 1993 on both floppy disks and CD-ROM for the DOS
and Macintosh operating systems as well as the 3DO. The game was later
rereleased in 1995 and contained a Windows/Mac/DOS compatible disc.
